articles.description: England bowler James Anderson says he is ignoring any calls to retire because he "has a lot more to give".
articles.title: I've no interest in retiring any time soon - Anderson

articles.description: England face Barbados in their opening Pool B match at the Netball World Cup in Cape Town - follow live text commentary.
articles.title: Netball World Cup: England dominating Barbados

articles.description: Max Verstappen sets the fastest time in Belgian Grand Prix qualifying but a grid penalty means Ferrari's Charles Leclerc will start from pole position.
articles.title: Leclerc on Belgium pole after Verstappen penalty

articles.description: Lauren James is the player everyone is excited about following her performance in England's victory over Denmark.
articles.title: 'Special' James makes her mark at Women's World Cup

articles.description: England's final Ashes Test against Australia hangs in the balance after a compelling battle for control on the second day at The Oval.
articles.title: Australia hold narrow lead after tense day two

articles.description: Manchester United reject a £20m bid from West Ham for their England defender Harry Maguire.
articles.title: Man Utd reject £20m West Ham bid for Maguire

articles.description: Watch the moment England's Lauren James scores brilliantly to fire England into the lead as they take on Denmark at the Fifa Women's World Cup.
articles.title: 'Sensational!' James fires England into early lead

articles.description: Ex-England captain Michael Vaughan says some of Australia's batting on day two of the final Ashes Test was the worst he had ever seen from the tourists.
articles.title: Sluggish Australia batting 'worst I've seen from them'

articles.description: Listen to BBC radio commentary of St Helens v Leeds Rhinos and Hull KR v Castleford Tigers in the Super League.
articles.title: Listen Super League: St Helens v Leeds and Hull KR v Castleford

articles.description: Juventus are kicked out of this season's Europa Conference League and fined for breaching Financial Fair Play rules, Uefa has announced.
articles.title: Juventus kicked out of Europe by Uefa
